experience: You and Amit both know Jason Patino, Jeff Lin, and 14 others
I gave a lecture at Cornell Tech.
This is a two billion dollar campus funded by the greatest wealth in the world.
It looks like a setting out of a SciFi movie.
A typical speaker is Eric Schmidt or Michael Bloomberg.
But I could offer something different.
After I showed them my LinkedIn stats, one finance student asked,
“Why is our advanced marketing professor not teaching us this?”
Growth hacking is still a foreign concept to most.
And it’s often used in the wrong context.
Another student asked, “Is building an MVP with traction the best way to know if you have product/market fit?”
I replied, “There’s never been a better time to validate ideas.”
You’ll validate the idea within 72 hours.”
You could hear a pin drop.
The next day the students would attend a career day.
They’d talk to companies like Microsoft, Amazon, and McKinsey.
All because they want more experience to start a company and not fail.
Starting up and failure cost less than ever before.
And when you live in a time where technology evolves faster than education.

Urgent need for Senior Level Fullstack Java Developers with our client in the consulting business in Dallas. Long term project with bleeding edge technology. Must be local to Dallas and able to meet in person for consideration. Able to offer a $500 referral fee. Who do you know?

Offer accepted!  I am happy to announce that after nearly the longest seven months of my life I have accepted a phenomenal position.  It was tough turning down a couple positions since my layoff because they were not the right fit but it was well worth the wait.  Thank you to all that supported me and a special thank you to my awesome wife for being there for me.  Start date 11/6, bring on this new challenge!

ACE Technologies, Inc. is a software solutions and an IT staffing company with over 500 full-time software professionals working across the US. We have been providing onsite-consulting services on a corp-to-corp basis for the last fourteen years years.Ace Technologies Inc., helps clients significantly improve their ability to bring new business into their companies. At Ace we understand that timelines are tight. Results are significant, quick and measurable.WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU:Personalized service from an ACE Accounts Manager exclusively assigned to work with you. Access to 150 to 200 consultants covering spectrum of in demand hot skills at any point of time. Quick turnaround time from initial contact to the start date of the project. We carefully assess a client's current requirements and deliver perfect fit consultant through an intelligently crafted process that produce increased results in minimal time.We are willing to embrace newer ways of doing business and will constantly reinvent ourselves, if it adds more value to your business. This stems from a strong and defining belief that, ‘ we grow only when our customers do ’.
